name: Egg Noodles With Cheese
keywords: butter, cheese, egg noodles, side dish
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 pound grated Gruyere or Swiss cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles in boiling salted water until tender. Drain and reserve 1/4 cup of the cooking liquid. Return the noodles to the pot. Add salt and pepper to taste, nutmeg, butter and the reserved cooking liquid. Add the cheese. Toss well to blend over medium heat. Serve immediately.
